--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> (KSLawdogg, Uhm, what can be done about this.  I had posted that 
> Shadow Wing had passed on already. Cyberwolf, who just now posted 
> about the fight, tries to save the char.  What should be done about 
> his.  Can Shadow Wing be saved or is she still dead?  As far as I 
> know, your the senior RPGer here. What can or should be done about 
> it???))
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > OK here I go again
> > 
> > starting with 11998
> > 
> > Lunarpine smiles, pleased with his marksmanship when he sees 
> > Serpentor turn and fire, Lunarpine drops to the ground as the 
blast 
> > sails over him into a large tree, with a loud crash the tree fell 
> > down atop the wolfbot temrorarily pinning him to the ground.
> > 
> > 12002
> > The wolfbot rolls as much as possible trying to free himself, he 
> > smells Shadow Wings scent not very far away along with the 
> > continueing weaponsfire.
> > 
> > 12005 He pushes at the tree, trying to move it off him when he 
> hears 
> > Wings screem of pain.
> > 
> > 12023
> > Lunarpine forces the tree offhis body enough to roll over onto 
his 
> > back. he has more trouble than usual seeing the action, The claws 
> on 
> > his right arm extend and slash through the tree freeing him from 
> his 
> > confines. He stands ready for almost anything and what he saw was 
> the 
> > only thing he wasn't prepared for.
> > 
> > 12028
> > Serpentor stood over Lunarpines love with his foot on her as if 
she 
> > were some trophy. Lunarpine raised his weapon to Serpentor.
> > 
> > 12034 Lunarpine charges downhill fireing at Serpentor as he goes.
> > "Leave her be, her Spark doesn't belong to you, it's mine to do 
> with

> > The wolfbots yell echoes through the battlefield as an
